message: Jessica Coleman-it was NOT aimed at you, so don't take it so personally & I WAS NOT calling this dad a narcissist, so I was not presuming anything actually. It was a general statement about anyone who feels the need to constantly video tape themselves doing anything & putting it out there for everyone, that's called narcissism, look it up. It wasn't directed at one person.

We/USA are the laughing stock of the world. With our guns are more important than people lives!!!! Does not matter what the age or where the massacre. Guns and the push of the NRA rally every time. Other civilized countries can and do have better laws on gun control. I'm not a paranoid person who sees shadows and someone coming for them at every turn. What I do see are children gunned down, normal every day people at movies gun down, Universities students gun down, Marines gun down, people in a church gun down. This is real life for us now. Not a TV show. We are in a sad state of affairs. It's not the Presidents fault. He has talked and talked upon every slaughter. This is greed, selfishness, and paranoia.

I don't think we're too concerned with each others' opinions. But I do think, and perhaps you'll agree, that judging from many of the comments here, that her concern for Peru was wasted. They voted in a corrupt, despotic scumbag and they would rather hate an American who sublet her apartment to the wrong crowd(according to them) than just admit that they elected an authoritarian asshole.
